title: Break Down Shipping Cartons
description: After restocking shelves, an associate needs to break down the empty cardboard cartons for recycling.

tasks.description: Gather all empty cartons from the sales floor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate collects the cardboard waste.

tasks.description: Use a box cutter to safely break down the cartons so they are flat.
tasks.expected_outcome: The cartons are flattened for easier handling.

tasks.description: Place the flattened cardboard into the designated cardboard recycling baler.
tasks.expected_outcome: The waste is properly disposed of, keeping the backroom clean and safe.
